name: Resetera Dark Theme
description:
A comfy dark theme, WIP! Note: this doesn't really work since they changed the theme away from the old style one. 

If I get bored I might write one with better colors and fonts for the mainsite
additional_info:
Update:
Tracking down missing stuff, updating for mainsite theme changes

Update: 
Heaps of small fixes, code/poll has been styled. Still dunno how to catch an alert. Guess I need someone to quote me lol.

Update: 
Alerts are pink/purple now. 
Spoilers are black w/ white text. 
Changes to link coloring
unread circle will be purple again. 

Update: Search and profile pages

Update: White text in input box!
